name: Kit Rush RD
description: Hq interface are here to change your strategy when your ennemy already know your deck.

name: Weyland Ice Advanced
description: My first weyland deck. Wanted to use advancement on ice, looks funny.

name: Weyland Ice Advanced V1.1
description: +2 Jackson Howard, -2 matrix analyser, +1 trick of light, -1 commercialization

name: SanSan Acceleration v1.0
description:
Update of the classic Fast Advance / Tag n Bag NBN hybrid for Second Thoughts. Still the strongest Corp deck, if you ask me.

This time with no active tagging Operations, since the emphasis is less on the tag n bag, and more on the fast advance. Still, with a couple Scorched Earth, the threat should be enough to make the Runner wary.

Shipment from SanSan makes quite the difference, and allows for free Agenda scoring, when SanSan City Grid is active... that's why there's three copies of it, even with 3 Jackson Howard who could potentially recover trashed ones.

Less ICE, so not much space for extra remote servers, so there's only 3 Marked Accounts due to their cost, that might make the Runner unwilling to trash even if left undefended.

Two copies of Muckraker shouldn't make Bad Publicity an issue, and Swordsman can help against the classic AI Icebreaker only decks.

name: Jintikering
description:
I have very little in the way of idea of how to build a deck; this is my current Jinteki build, but it doesn't use much of its influence. I'd appreciate some feedback and any ideas on how to trim it a bit.

The idea is that it will feed to an extent on Jinteki's strengths of misdirection and punishing successful runs, but I'm not sure how well it does that.

name: Kit Shaper 1.0
description: OK, I've got this one down to 47 - The idea is that it can hopefully build its own economy without having to drain too much in the way of time, which can be better spent (hopefully) running. It's not too competitive or anything like that, but I'd appreciate feedback, suggestions, pointers. Thanks!

name: Rielle_0.5b
description:
This deck is still in beta so be patient and help me out!
My ideas as to possible final tunings:
- parasite --> Wyrm (more reliable but more expensive)
- parasite, snowball --> corroder, escher (escher is cool)
- snowball --> 3rd Atman or Inti perhaps
- 2 x Modded 2 x Personal Workshop (though I like the first best as it is faster, IMO)
One opus should suffice as you can clone it back/call it up with SMC if needed. Two SOT are there to give you extra copies of your favourite events when you need them: in previous versions I found myself short of stuff as I tended to dig in too much by using Professional Contacts. My main concern is that I would like to stick one Escher in (you can use SOT if it gets discarded early on), but I really do not how to make space for it. Comments are welcome!

name: Reina Roja (Looking for Feedback)
description: Here is my first attempt at the new Identity. My only concern is Run credit efficiency on knight since I have never actually see it played.

name: Weyland - It Smells Like Meat V1
Reina dENiAL
description: The idea behind this deck is to make it so insanely expensive for the corp to rez ICE that they can't/won't. If it's the first ICE to be rezzed for the turn, even a Pop-Up is $4 if Xanadu and Rook are out! FAO is there to force them to trash ICE and Crescentus is there to punish rezzed ICE. If they do rez something, then I have the fixed cheap breaker suite to cut thru it, with Bishop and Datasucker to help. Clone Chip keeps the Caissa coming back for more. I'd like to fit Ice Carver in, but I'm not sure what to cut. The most obvious to me is Djinn/Medium, but I'd like something to beef up R&D runs. Thoughts??
